text: Ytterbium(III) sulfate (ytterbium sulphate) is a ytterbium salt of sulfuric acid, with formula Yb2(SO4)3. It is used mostly for research.MSDS == References == == External links == * Ytterbium Sulfate American Elements Category:Ytterbium compounds Category:Sulfates
title: Ytterbium(III) sulfate
